snippet.title: Pinball M - Official Announcement Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description:
Pinball M is a brand-new digital pinball platform with a horror theme developed by Zen Studios. Experience the classic pinball gameplay with tables inspired by horror IPs from the likes of Dead by Daylight and Wrath of the Elder Gods. Players can craft their own personal corner of horrors in the game with eerie decorative elements which can be earned through gameplay. Pinball M is coming soon to PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#PinballM #TheMixNextShowcase2023
